description: This file defines a Java interface 'PictogramRepository' that extends 'MongoRepository' to provide CRUD operations and custom query methods for 'Pictogram' documents in a MongoDB database.

classes.name: PictogramRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data MongoDB repository interface for CRUD operations and custom queries on Pictogram documents.

methods.name: findByOwnerIdAndTitle
methods.description: Finds a pictogram by owner ID and title, returning an Optional containing the Pictogram if found.

methods.name: findAllByOwnerId
methods.description: Retrieves all pictograms associated with a specific owner ID.
